pred_item.label: IDP-126 gel
pred_item.description: Participants receive clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% (IDP-126) gel applied to the face once daily for 12 weeks.

pred_item.label: BPO/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Participants receive benzoyl peroxide 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% gel applied to the face once daily for 12 weeks.

pred_item.label: CLIN/BPO gel
pred_item.description: Participants receive clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide 3.1% gel applied to the face once daily for 12 weeks.

pred_item.label: CLIN/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Participants receive clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/adapalene 0.15% gel applied to the face once daily for 12 weeks.

pred_item.label: Vehicle gel
pred_item.description: Participants receive vehicle gel applied to the face once daily for 12 weeks.

pred_item.name: IDP-126 gel
pred_item.description: Fixed-dose triple-combination topical clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide (BPO) 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% gel.

pred_item.name: BPO/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Component dyad gel containing benzoyl peroxide 3.1%/adapalene 0.15% formulated with the same active drug concentration and within the same vehicle as IDP-126.

pred_item.name: CLIN/BPO gel
pred_item.description: Component dyad gel containing clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/benzoyl peroxide 3.1% formulated with the same active drug concentration and within the same vehicle as IDP-126.

pred_item.name: CLIN/ADAP gel
pred_item.description: Component dyad gel containing clindamycin phosphate 1.2%/adapalene 0.15% formulated with the same active drug concentration and within the same vehicle as IDP-126.

pred_item.name: Vehicle gel
pred_item.description: Vehicle gel formulation without active ingredients.

ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 12 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Absolute change in inflammatory lesion counts
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean absolute changes from baseline in inflammatory lesion counts.

ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 12 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Absolute change in noninflammatory lesion counts
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean absolute changes from baseline in noninflammatory lesion counts.

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score
ref_item.description: Success was defined as at least a two grade reduction and clear or almost clear at Week 12. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.description: The proportion of participants achieving a ≥ 2-grade reduction from baseline in Evaluator’s Global Severity Score (EGSS) and a score of 0 (clear) or 1 (almost clear). The EGSS is scored as follows: 0 = Normal, clear skin; 1 = Rare noninflammatory lesions present; 2 = Some noninflammatory lesions, few inflammatory lesions; 3 = Noninflammatory lesions predominate, multiple inflammatory lesions; 4 = Inflammatory lesions are more apparent, many comedones and papules/pustules.

ref_item.measure: Inflammatory Lesion Count Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.description: Questionnaire covering four domains (self-perception, role-emotional, role-social, and acne symptoms); a higher score indicates improved health-related quality of life.

ref_item.measure: Non-inflammatory Lesion Count Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Absolute change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

ref_item.measure: Inflammatory Lesion Count Percentage Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Percentage change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Percent change in inflammatory lesion counts
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean percent reduction from baseline in inflammatory lesion counts.

ref_item.measure: Non-inflammatory Lesion Count Percentage Changes at Week 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Percentage change from Baseline to Week 2, 4, and 8 in mean non-inflammatory lesion counts

pred_item.measure: Percent change in noninflammatory lesion counts
pred_item.description: Least-squares mean percent reduction from baseline in noninflammatory lesion counts.

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score at Weeks 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Success was defined as at least a two grade reduction and clear or almost clear at the visit. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.description: The proportion of participants achieving a ≥ 2-grade reduction from baseline in EGSS and a score of 0 (clear) or 1 (almost clear) at intermediate visits.

ref_item.measure: Percentage of Participants With Two Grade Success on the Evaluator's Global Severity Score - at Weeks 2, 4, and 8
ref_item.description: Two grade success was defined as at least a two grade reduction. The Evaluator's Global Severity Score has grades for acne severity of 0 (Clear), 1 (Almost Clear), 2 (Mild), 3 (Moderate), and 4 (Severe), with higher scores indicating worse severity.

pred_item.measure: Proportion of participants with ≥ 2-grade reduction in EGSS
pred_item.description: Percentage of participants achieving a reduction of at least 2 grades in the Evaluator’s Global Severity Score from baseline.
